MonsterTrait.Name: Bred to the Saddle
MonsterTrait.Text: Gerridae do not take any penalties to their movement or speed due to encumbrance or carrying a single rider.

MonsterTrait.Name: Waterborne
MonsterTrait.Text: Any gerridae can run while on the surface of water, but not while on land or climbing. They treat stormy water as normal rather than difficult terrain. A gerridae takes one point of damage for every hour spent on dry land.

MonsterTrait.Name: Multiattack
MonsterTrait.Text: The gerridae makes one bite attack and one claw attack.

MonsterAction.Name: Bite
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

MonsterAction.Name: Claw
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) slashing damage.
